headline: RTX Clinches a Deal to Support ESSM and NSMS Programs
summary: RTX's unit Raytheon secures a contract for engineering and technical services in support of the ESSM and NSMS programs.

headline: Lockheed's Unit Secures a Contract to Aid AEGIS Weapon System
summary: LMT's unit, Rotary and Mission Systems, secures a modification contract involving the AEGIS weapon system.

headline: 2 Large-Cap Stocks with Exciting Potential and 1 to Avoid
summary: Large-cap stocks are known for their staying power and ability to weather market storms better than smaller competitors. However, their sheer size makes it more challenging to maintain high growth rates as they’ve already captured significant portions of their markets.

raw.headline: 2 Large-Cap Stocks with Exciting Potential and 1 to Avoid
raw.summary: Large-cap stocks are known for their staying power and ability to weather market storms better than smaller competitors. However, their sheer size makes it more challenging to maintain high growth rates as they’ve already captured significant portions of their markets.

headline: Northrop Grumman (NOC): Among the Best American Defense Stocks to Buy Now
summary: We recently compiled a list of the 11 Best American Defense Stocks to Buy Now. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Northrop Grumman Corporation (NYSE:NOC) stands against other best American defense stocks. America’s defense sector has struggled under Trump’s second term as president, amid mixed views on military expenditure […]

headline: Northrop Grumman : NG InSight™ to Demonstrate Secure Communications Integration for US Air Force Connectivity
summary: SAN DIEGO - March 18, 2025 - Northrop Grumman Corporation was awarded a follow-on contract to help the U.S. Air Force connect airborne platforms with faster, secure communications solutions. ...
